title: Chicken with Garlic, Garlic and More Garlic
ingredients: ['30g butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 whole chicken', '40 cloves garlic, peeled', '4 tablespoons water', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon dried or 1 teaspoon of fresh thyme', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper']
